title: FieldStatsInfo should expose sumOfSquares.
description:
The stats component returns sumOfSquares as part of its result. The value is picked up by FieldStatsInfo but cannot be directly accessed as there's no getter present. 

The value is also missing in toString().

SideNote: when in the class anyway it would be nice if a SolrServerException instead of plain RuntimeException could be thrown for unknown keys.
